sentences.sContent: The artisan can cut stones into various shapes.
sentences.sContent_eng: The artisan can cut stones into various shapes.
sentences.sCn: 这工匠能把石头雕成各种形状。

sentences.sContent: The authors are award-winning artisan chocolatiers who make their own chocolate right from beans in micro-batches.
sentences.sContent_eng: The authors are award-winning artisan chocolatiers who make their own chocolate right from beans in micro-batches.
sentences.sCn: 作者是获过奖的巧克力技工，他们用一小批的豆子做巧克力。

trans.tranOther: someone who does skilled work, making things with their hands
